********************************** Readme **********************************

Compliance test bit streams and decoded PCM files generated by

Susanne Ritscher				     ritscher@irt.de
Institut fuer Rundfunktechnik (IRT)		     phone: +49-89-32399-458
Floriansmuehlstr. 60, D-80939 Muenchen, Germany	     fax:   +49-89-32399-415
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


Test signal "Test15"
	"Test15" means the 15th item in the paper which title is
	"Schedule of activities for MPEG-2 Audio Compliance".


Files:	test15.mpg	(encoded base bitstream)
	test15_c.pcm	(decoded pcm file, center channel)
	test15_l.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left channel)
	test15_ls.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left surround channel)
	test15_r.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right channel)
	test15_rs.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right surround channel)


Description:
	matrix					3
	extension				-
	transmission channel allocation		-
	phantom center				no
	prediction				yes
	dynamic cross talk			no
	sampling freq.				48K
	LFE					no
	multilingal				no
	ancillary data				no
	bitrate base stream			384kbps
	bitrate extension stream		-
	configuration				3/2
